title: AK1 Smart Home Studio with Balcony
amenities: Private kitchen;Private bathroom;Refrigerator;Washing machine;Work desk;Private toilet;No Parking;Laminate flooring;Gas heating;Private kitchenware;WiFi
Long_description: One of eleven bright smart studios located in a shared apartment, each offering a private bathroom and fully equipped kitchenette. This 17 sqm studio features a balcony with street view and is designed for one person. The apartment is freshly renovated and located in the very center of Riga, within walking distance of Old Town, Vermanes Park, and shopping centers Stockmann and Origo. The studio includes WiFi, work desk, washing machine, refrigerator, kitchenware, and gas heating. The building is on the fourth floor without an elevator. Non-smoking. Ideal for students or professionals looking for a comfortable and central stay.

The property is freshly renovated and located just a few minutes' walk from Old Town, Vermanes Park, and major shopping centers. Located on the fourth floor with no elevator. Non-smoking. A practical option for long-term stays in the city center.
